title: Help me finding a good Hack and Slash MMORPG
body:
I have been looking for a interessting MMO with Tera mechanics (hack and slash). So far i found:
--> Vindictus
--> Skyforge
--> Tera
--> Elsword
--> C9
--> Black Desert Online
--> Bless Online
--> RaiderZ
--> Monster Hunter Online (No EU release still??)
--> Rise of Incarnates.

Those are F2P hack and slash MMORPGS if you know any others post here please, thanks.
